dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright issue - urgent attention please
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 2004 4:25 PM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright issue - urgent attention please

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Forwarding to Legal for review.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Northern Angels Support <support@northern-angels.co.uk>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 20, 2004, 1:56:50 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright issue - urgent attention please

===8<==============Original message text===============
Dear Sirs,

I believe that a company called "performancehosting.net" is a reseller of
your hosting services and I am contacting you as a safeguard in a matter
concerning copryright theft by one of their clients, as I notice from their
site, that they "accept no responsibility" for such issues - an
irresponsible attitude to say the least.

Below is a copy of the email I have sent them. This is an extremely serious
issue and I would greatly appreciate your assistance in helping us to combat
this theft from our website.

Thanks in advance.

David
Northern Angels

ORIGINAL EMAIL SENT TO PERFORMANCEHOSTING.NET

Dear Sirs,

A site that you host is using copyrighted images and content from our =
site without our permission.

Examples:
http://www.satinguide.com/sites/lauren/?twPgX=3DpAx

http://www.satinguide.com/sites/stacey/?twPgX=3DpAx

http://www.satinguide.com/sites/emma/?twPgX=3DpAx

http://www.satinguide.com/sites/allana/?twPgX=3DpAx

In fact MOST of the profiles on this page =
http://www.satinguide.com/index.jsp?searchPage=3Dyes&category=3D1&city=3D=
2&features=3D# were stolen from us at www.northern-angels.co.uk

As ultimate publisher, we are holding you responsible for displaying =
this content and would respectfully request that you adhere to the =
professional photographers copyright rules concerning web hosting and =
ask your clients to remove this content as soon as possible.

I hope that we can resolve this matter without legal intervention, but =
we reserve the right to pursue a claim for substantial damages if our =
content is not removed within 24 hours.

Your client is using false contact information on the domain =
registration and this breaches ICANN regulations. For this reason, I =
have no choice than to contact yourselves.=20

I look forward to hearing from you.

Regards,

David
Northern Angels

===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFBdtfGvK/XpJs6oyURAptZAJ0Q/rgBzCBfoyiznmfb7HD4pyRrMwCffZAy
p9eZt7mwsOI8b9cB0sa5hXo=
=fzVz
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
